bannerTesto: Describify is in beta. Sign up now to get a discounted price!
heroDescrizione: Speed up listing creation and boost your sales on Vinted, eBay, Subito, and Wallapop
erroreInvioEmailWaitlist: You have successfully subscribed to the waitlist, but there was an error in sending the email
erroreIscrizioneWaitlist: There was an error while trying to get the waitlist, try again later!
erroreImprevistoWaitlist: An unexpected error occurred while subscribing to the waitlist, please try again later!
erroreInputWaitlist: The email entered is not valid
funzionalitàDescrizione: Describify creates optimized listings for you, so you can focus on what really matters.
funzionalitàStep1Descrizione: Choose a clear and detailed image for the best results
funzionalitàStep2Descrizione: Describify recognizes and fills in your product details automatically, always editable for complete personalization
funzionalitàStep3Descrizione: Describify created the listing for you in an instant, saving you time and effort
funzionalitàStep4Descrizione: Upload the listing to your favorite sales platform and start earning immediately
componenteVenditaTitolo: Black Vans T-shirt - Size M - Excellent Condition
componenteVenditaDescrizione: Hi! I'm selling my black Vans t-shirt, size M. I bought it a while ago...
prezziTitolo: Pay only for what you use
prezziDescrizione: No expiry, no monthly or annual subscription, just purchase the package with the number of credits you need
prezziPianoBasicDescrizione: Perfect for those who want to start exploring the platform without commitment
prezziPianoStandardDescrizione: Ideal for those who want to sell regularly and maximize earnings
prezziPianoPremiumDescrizione: The perfect plan for professional sellers who want to grow quickly
faqsDescrizione: We have all the answers you need. Learn more about how we can help you create your listings
footerDescrizione: Create listings for your second-hand items quickly and easily with Describify
modalMessageDescrizione: Thank you for joining our waitlist! You'll be among the first to know when the platform is ready and will receive priority access at an exclusive price.
modalWaitlistTitolo: Get Ready to Start with Us!
modalWaitlistDescrizione1: Join our waitlist today and secure early access to the platform.
modalWaitlistDescrizione2: Waitlist members will have exclusive access to our initial features and enjoy a special reserved price!
modalCookieDescrizione: We monitor Describify's traffic using external platforms, but without using third-party cookies. For more details, read here:
